9323503b-e665-4a5c-bf37-b49be9f12b14.description: Earners will gain a fundamental understanding on how to perform and document skilled visits, infection control reports, incident reports, create home health aide care plans, and create and update medication profiles as they become familiar with regulatory guidelines. Upon successful course completion, nurses, therapists, social workers, and home health aides will have the knowledge to perform certified routine visits using Axxess solutions.
9323503b-e665-4a5c-bf37-b49be9f12b14.name: Home Health Clinical Fundamental

alignments.name: American Nurses Credentialing Center (ANCC)
alignments.description: Completing this certification track will earn the following continuing education (CE) credits: American Nurses Credentialing Center (ANCC) - 17.25 CE credits

badge_template_activities.title: Review regulatory and accreditation requirements for receiving and delivering home health care, and Axxess technology solution resources for delivering home health care.
Complete assessment of home health knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

8921738c-7ffe-48b4-8d49-3c1ed32634fe.description: Earners will understand how to perform and document routine visits for terminally ill patients, infection control reports, incident reports, create individual plans of care, prepare for IDG meetings, and create and update medication profiles as they become familiar with regulatory guidelines and the fundamental practices for caring for terminally ill patients. Nurses, therapists, social workers, chaplains, and home health aides are prepared for certified routine visits with Axxess solutions.
8921738c-7ffe-48b4-8d49-3c1ed32634fe.name: Hospice Clinical Fundamental

alignments.name: American Nurses Credentialing Center (ANCC)
alignments.description: Completing this certification track will earn the following continuing education (CE) credits: American Nurses Credentialing Center (ANCC) - 17.00 CE credits.

badge_template_activities.title: Review how to perform and document routine visits for terminally ill patients, infection control reports, incident reports, create individual plans of care, prepare for IDG meetings, and create and update medication profiles as they become familiar with regulatory guidelines and the fundamental practices for caring for terminally ill patients.
Complete assessment of hospice knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

a68e560d-c0dc-4782-b236-5cc855196f24.description: Earners will understand how to effectively document in a wide variety of service line offerings using Axxess solutions to solidify their success in the home care industry. Nurses, therapists, and caregivers receive a firm foundational knowledge to perform and supervise direct care in the home.
a68e560d-c0dc-4782-b236-5cc855196f24.name: Home Care Clinical Fundamental

alignments.name: American Nurses Credentialing Center (ANCC)
alignments.description: Completing this certification track will earn the following continuing education (CE) credits: American Nurses Credentialing Center (ANCC) - 6.00 CE credits.

badge_template_activities.title: Home Care Clinical Medical Fundamental course

Review how to effectively document in a wide variety of service line offerings using Axxess solutions to solidify their success in the home care industry. Nurses, therapists, and caregivers receive a firm foundational knowledge to perform and supervise direct care in the home.
Complete assessment of home health knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

b8db0cff-c2ce-4757-a5c7-88faa7ab36fc.description: Earners will be prepared as home care management staff for a supervisory career in the home care industry (PAS, infusion, pediatrics, and private pay) while providing valuable continuing education credits. Participants will understand how to QI a wide variety of documents to ensure compliance with regulatory standards, and how to supervise effectively using technically enhanced workflows.
b8db0cff-c2ce-4757-a5c7-88faa7ab36fc.name: Home Care Non-Medical

badge_template_activities.title: Home Care Caregiver course
Review how to QI a wide variety of documents to ensure compliance with regulatory standards, and how to supervise effectively using technically enhanced workflows.
Complete assessment of home health knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

aaf248c9-a86d-4624-8dd2-5ecb46756a21.description: Earners will be prepared as home care administrators and management staff for a home care leadership career. Participants will be able to deliver operational excellence using Axxess workflows and understand how to use reports to drive key business decisions. They will also gain skills to effectively lead and manage business operations such as scheduling, intake, and orders management, and they will gain a deep understanding of the compliant flexibility within Axxess.
aaf248c9-a86d-4624-8dd2-5ecb46756a21.name: Home Care Operational

badge_template_activities.title: Prerequisite Axxess Home Care Operational Fundamentals
Review skills to effectively lead and manage business operations such as scheduling, intake, and orders management ,and they will gain a deep understanding of the compliant flexibility within Axxess.
Complete assessment of home health knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

4b9d7106-d27e-403f-94b3-09cbd4b2b79d.description: Earners will understand how to perform the initial comprehensive assessment and complete the required documentation for the HIS data set while efficiently using Axxess software workflows. They will gain and understanding of the rationale for maintaining compliance with current regulatory standards. Hospice assessment staff will learn how to develop and lead IDG meetings and effectively document eligibility using Local Coverage Determinations (LCDs).
4b9d7106-d27e-403f-94b3-09cbd4b2b79d.name: Hospice Clinical

badge_template_activities.title: Prerequisite Hospice Clinical Fundamental

Review how to perform the initial comprehensive assessment and complete the required documentation for the HIS data set while efficiently using Axxess software workflows. They will gain and understanding of the rationale for maintaining compliance with current regulatory standards. Hospice assessment staff will learn how to develop and lead IDG meetings and effectively document eligibility using Local Coverage Determinations (LCDs).
Complete assessment of hospice knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

e7bd2be6-d81a-4ae8-8c8d-110bbafbf134.description: Earners will develop operational excellence skills using Axxess Hospice software workflows and learn how to manage using reports to drive key business decisions. They will also gain skills to effectively lead and manage business operations, including scheduling, intake, orders management, IDG, volunteer services, timely HIS exports, and bereavement counseling.
e7bd2be6-d81a-4ae8-8c8d-110bbafbf134.name: Hospice Operational

badge_template_activities.title: Prerequisite Hospice Operational Fundamental

Review how to develop operational excellence skills using Axxess Hospice software workflows and learn how to manage using reports to drive key business decisions. They will also gain skills to effectively lead and manage business operations, including scheduling, intake, orders management, IDG, volunteer services, timely HIS exports, and bereavement counseling.
Complete assessment of hospice knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

18e74fdb-237a-4e4c-a562-d74929ee5233.description: Earners will be prepared as billers, office managers, billing supervisors, financial analysts and controllers for a financial management career in home care. Learners will understand how to build payer sources for commercial insurance-based contract adjustments, use the RCM product to ensure accurate and timely financial forecasting, and manage and track revenue through a wide variety of reports.
18e74fdb-237a-4e4c-a562-d74929ee5233.name: Home Care Financial

badge_template_activities.title: Prerequisite Axxess Home Care Financial Fundamentals

Review how to build payer sources for commercial insurance-based contract adjustments, use the RCM product to ensure accurate and timely financial forecasting, and manage and track revenue through a wide variety of reports.
Complete assessment of home health knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

2dc51e77-2098-4646-9e54-69afa24b0475.description: Earners will gain the skills necessary to ensure accurate and timely billing for Medicare, Medicare Advantage and commercial insurance claims for routine hospice, general inpatient hospice, respite care, continuous care, and service intensity add-on.
2dc51e77-2098-4646-9e54-69afa24b0475.name: Hospice Financial

badge_template_activities.title: Prerequisite Hospice Financial Fundamental

Review how to ensure accurate and timely billing for Medicare, Medicare Advantage and commercial insurance claims for routine hospice, general inpatient hospice, respite care, continuous care, and service intensity add-on.
Complete assessment of hospice knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

c0482ff9-24ad-4161-8e6b-3fb2d2b8332f.description: Earners will be prepared as home care management staff for a supervisory career in the home care industry (PAS, infusion, pediatrics, and private pay) while providing valuable continuing education credits. Participants will understand how to QI a wide variety of documents to ensure compliance with regulatory standards, and how to supervise effectively using technically enhanced workflows.
c0482ff9-24ad-4161-8e6b-3fb2d2b8332f.name: Home Care Clinical

badge_template_activities.title: Home Care Clinical Medical Fundamental and Advanced courses
Review how to QI a wide variety of documents to ensure compliance with regulatory standards, and how to supervise effectively using technically enhanced workflows.
Complete assessment of home health knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

b599e2f7-de4b-4df7-87b6-0ba4fe809b73.description: The Axxess Home Care Non-Medical Fundamentals course will prepare CNAs, home health aides and homemaker aides for a fulfilling career as a direct care professional by combining introductory industry and Axxess solution knowledge while providing valuable certification hours often required to maintain certification. Upon course completion staff will be able to document routine visits, incidents, complaints and first report of infections.
b599e2f7-de4b-4df7-87b6-0ba4fe809b73.name: Home Care Caregiver

badge_template_activities.title: Review how to document routine visits, incidents, complaints and first report of infections.
Complete assessment of home health knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

12f34ffc-430e-4efb-93a0-97ee54a354be.description: Earners will be prepared as certified home health administrators and management staff for a home health leadership career. Participants will develop operational excellence skills using Axxess software workflows and how to manage using reports to drive key business decisions. They will learn how to effectively lead and manage key business operations, including scheduling, intake, and orders management.
12f34ffc-430e-4efb-93a0-97ee54a354be.name: Home Health Operational

badge_template_activities.title: Home Health Operational Fundamental

Participants will develop operational excellence skills using Axxess software workflows and how to manage using reports to drive key business decisions. They will learn how to effectively lead and manage key business operations, including scheduling, intake, and orders management.
Complete assessment of home health knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

ff248916-e090-4082-b298-eb02220e579a.description: Earners will prepare billing administrative staff for a career as an office biller, document specialist or orders management coordinator. Learners will develop the skills necessary to ensure accurate and timely billing of Medicare, Medicare Advantage and commercial insurance claims.
ff248916-e090-4082-b298-eb02220e579a.name: Home Health Financial

badge_template_activities.title: Prerequisite Home Health Financial Fundamental
Review the skills necessary to ensure accurate and timely billing of Medicare, Medicare Advantage and commercial insurance claims.
Complete assessment of home health knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

ffb5699a-1d88-4549-b987-30f3832303c2.description: Earners are prepared as a professional home health case manager or rehab supervisor. Learners will understand how to perform and document OASIS visits, and create and update an evolving patient plan of care to meet patients’ short-term and long-term goals through interdisciplinary care coordination. RNs, PTs, OTs, and STs, are prepared to case manage with appropriate frequencies, treatment modalities, and human resources to achieve positive patient outcomes with efficient cost-saving strategies.
ffb5699a-1d88-4549-b987-30f3832303c2.name: Home Health Clinical

alignments.name: American Nurses Credentialing Center (ANCC)
alignments.description: Completing this certification track will earn the following continuing education (CE) credits: American Nurses Credentialing Center (ANCC) - 6.50 CE credits.

badge_template_activities.title: Prerequisite Home Health Clinical Fundamental
Review how to perform and document OASIS visits, and create and update an evolving patient plan of care to meet patients’ short-term and long-term goals through interdisciplinary care coordination.
Complete assessment of home health knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.

7d4cb5cc-d62d-40ef-a0f5-e401d1b074cc.description: Earners will gain a fundamental understanding on how to perform and document skilled visits, infection control reports, incident reports, create home health aide care plans, and create and update medication profiles as they become familiar with regulatory guidelines. Upon successful course completion, nurses and therapists will have the basic knowledge to perform certified routine visits using Axxess Home Health solutions.
7d4cb5cc-d62d-40ef-a0f5-e401d1b074cc.name: Axxess CARE Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: Prerequisite Axxess CARE Fundamental
Review regulatory and accreditation requirements for receiving and delivering home health care, and Axxess technology solution resources for delivering home health care.
Complete assessment of home health knowledge and pass with a minimum score of 80%.
